subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Billy Gillispie, who was 40-27 in two years as Kentucky's basketball coach, was fired after the Wildcats lost to Notre Dame in the N.I.T. quarterfinal.
snippet: Billy Gillispie, who was 40-27 in two years as Kentucky's basketball coach, was fired after the Wildcats lost to Notre Dame in the N.I.T. quarterfinal.
